title: APEC Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from APEC.fr, France's leading executive job board. Search by keyword, city/department, contract type, and remote options.

startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of APEC search result URLs to process (each URL is treated independently).

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific APEC search URL. If provided, this overrides keyword/department settings for that run.

keyword.title: Search Keywords
keyword.description: Job title or skills to search for (e.g., 'Ingénieur Logiciel', 'Chef de Projet', 'Développeur').

location.title: City or Region
location.description: City or region to search (e.g., 'Paris', 'Lyon'). If set, this overrides department.

department.title: Department Code
department.description: French department number (e.g., '75' for Paris, '27' for Eure, '69' for Rhône).

contractType.title: Contract Type Codes
contractType.description: Optional filter by contract type codes (e.g., 143684 company, 143685 recruitment agency).

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each job detail page to extract complete descriptions and additional information.

useApi.title: Use JSON API First
useApi.description: Try the JSON API (faster) before HTML parsing. Falls back to HTML automatically if the API returns nothing.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs to Extract
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect (set to high number for all results).

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process (safety limit).

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrent requests (tune to control speed vs. blocking risk).

requestDelayMillis.title: Delay Between Requests (ms)
requestDelayMillis.description: Optional fixed delay between requests, with small jitter, to reduce blocking (milliseconds).

logLevel.title: Log Level
logLevel.description: Set log verbosity (error, warning, info, debug).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Recommended: Use Apify Proxy (residential or datacenter) to avoid blocking.
